channel.title: Terminolgy on Not a Peeker of Nature
channel.description: Recent content in Terminolgy on Not a Peeker of Nature

item.title: Terminolgy summary
item.description:
To memorize some frequently used terminologies and their pronunciations, here is a summary organized by topic

#Cell biology

1. Cell cycle and chromosomes

mitosis /maɪˈtoʊsɪs/ 有丝分裂
meiosis /maɪˈoʊsɪs/ 减数分裂
amitosis /ˌæmaɪˈtoʊsɪs/ 无丝分裂 polyploid /ˈpɒlɪplɔɪd/ 多倍体
